Moto E13 4GB RAM Review

Read Full Review
3.5/5

Moto E13 review: stock Android, good battery life, affordable price

The Moto E13 can be yours for as low as Rs 6,999. But is it worth the money? We answer that and more in this Moto E13 review. Read on.

Feb 20 2023 By Ashish Kumar
PROS
  • Nicely built
  • Clean and bloat-free OS
  • Good battery life
CONS
  • Underwhelming performance
  • Slow charging speeds
  • Cameras need improvement
Verdict

The Moto E13 could be worth considering for those looking for a stock Android smartphone in the budget segment. The handset doesn`t check all boxes but still manages to get the job done. It has a good design to begin with, followed by a solid battery life and a serviceable display. The performance and cameras could have been better, but one can`t really complain given its budget pricing. .

Very nice smartphone in this segment... everything is excellent no any problem for daily use... excellent 👌👌👌👌

Classy product
19 Feb 2023 By Ayush Mukherji On flipkart.com

•Pros:nn1.Camera is okay quality,good for class note/document photos.nn2.battery is one of the key highlights of this phone, approx 1.5 days stand by, and Motorola is the only one in this segment with type c charging.nn3. Software is another key highlight. I have the 2gb/64gb model, but the optimization is soo better than others, and the Android 13 Go Edition is the cherry on the top.nn4. Processor is best in the segment, far better than mediatek's Any "P"/ "G" series processor.For day to day usage and battery efficiency Unisoc did a very good job.nn5.2gb Ram for this variant works fine for me because it has the latest LPDDR4x ram type rather than LPDDR3x/4 type.nn6. Design is Best and premium in the whole 10k price segment.nn•Cons:-nn1. charging speed is really slow but we can't complain about it because of the price. It takes 3 to 4hr for full charge because of the 5000mah battery.nn2. Screen bottom chin is really thick. [Same reason for the price]nn3.Major sensors are missing like gyro sensor and some others. [Sad for COD and racing game fans]nn•For me I will give it 4.4/5 [best in the segment] n(Much much better than Poco c50/redmi A1/samsung core series)
